activities:
We collect email addresses to complete orders and through clients who request to receive info on sale prices, new products, brand events, and brand news. 
People can unsubscribe automatically for any reason at unsubscribe.com. Please see Privacy Policy.  We do not sell emails to 3rd parties.

personaldata: We will collect email addresses as part of the order process.  Emails are collected when people request regrstration to receive news on sales, events, new products and news about the brand.  Please see point 2 & 3 on our privacy policy.
